summary: Sathya and Kiruba are friends. Sathya is reckless and gets into drinking and violent fights whereas Kiruba studies hard to become a Sub-Inspector. Tables are turned when Sathya becomes a Sub-Inspector.
cast: Narain|Prasanna|Ajmal Ameer|Vijayalakshmi|R. Pandiaraajan|Ponvannan|M.S. Bhaskar|Livingston|Vijay Sethupathi|Anjathe Sridhar
title: Anjathe
